title: Ovals have a right to be treated equally!!!
body: I identify as an oval and I am offended by the lack of ovaljerks and general mistreatment of ovals in general, if you disagree with my opinions then you are just a filthy circle worshiping pig. I will continue to fight for jerking equality as the proud strong oval I am.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=m49hYkAd,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-14T13:03:53.353+0000)
>
> Shocking news: Everyone loves squares.

Squares set unrealistic body standards for rectangles, these companies posting pictures of airbrushed squares everywhere should be ashamed that they are forcing rectangles to feel uncomfortable about their perfectly healthy shape we need to teach rectangles that natural is beautiful and they don't need equal proportions to be attractive it just leads to low self esteem and poor diets among the people being brainwashed by the evil media.
I laughed at this way harder then i should have.
Is this a way of you coming out to the world, or just a joke?
Sit down and bow to catraven. He'll tell you what level of society accommodates to you.
